item.description:
Hi ladies!
A group of us did the Better Off Bowling league for the last session and are putting together a team for the next session! The session runs for about 6 weeks, and the team has 10 people. It runs March 24 through May 5. Registration is about $75 for the session and games are on Sunday afternoons at Jillian's. Register through the website at the link below and request to join our team, 'Lickity Splitz'. Hope to see you out there!
item.name: Better Off Bowling League March - May
